com.btmatthews.atlas.core.dao.mongo

Class MongoDAO<ID,I,T extends I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.atlas.core.dao.mongo.MongoDAO<ID,I,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    ID - The identifier class.
    I - The interface class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO<ID,I>

    public class MongoDAO<ID,I,T extends I>
extends Object
implements DAO<ID,I>
    Abstract base class that implements common features of data access objects that use MongoDB for persistence.
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews
